text: Lapathus or Lapathos (ancient Greek: Λάπαθος) may refer to: *Lapathus (Cyprus), a town of ancient Cyprus *Lapathus (Thessaly), a town of ancient Thessaly, Greece *Lapathos, Cyprus, a village in modern Cyprus *Lapathus (mythology), a Greek mythological figure, legendary founder of Lapathus (Cyprus)
title: Lapathus
